item.title: Idiot server request

item.description:
@Angel_Carlos wrote:

if are hyperions download client or webclient compatible {

Sendrequest(“any links to both source and client with cache or auto cache download”);

} else {

Sendrequest(“look above please link me.”);
}

Just link me if you can make Hyperion webclient or do client compatible.

Oh and I prefer if it had a music or sound system
